ksql: CREATE STREAM transaction_signed WITH (PARTITIONS=1, VALUE_FORMAT='AVRO', KAFKA_TOPIC='transaction_signed') AS SELECT merchant_id, payment_scheme, transaction_type, CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'REFUND' THEN (-1 * transaction_amount) ELSE transaction_amount END AS "transaction_amount_signed", terminal_business_day FROM transaction_input;
